basic.blooming: Flowering period March-May, fruiting period October-November in the next year
basic.color: Leaf color dark green , fruit color red brown

maintenance.soil: Fertile calcareous soil or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, grows in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Resistant to flood, water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead, rotten, diseased leaves and the parts that may affect the good appearance
